csl.abstract: An early critique of Riegl and Panofsky, advocating a functionalist approach to imagery that Gombrich later described as an 'ecology of images'.
csl.title: Gombrich, formalism and the description of works of Art

2.rendermd: We see here how little style is determined by observations of nature alone, and that it is always decorative principles, convictions of taste, to which the last decision is assigned. 19
